review_text: I love my new Echo Dot. Alexa understands my commands and the speaker quality is great!
The Kindle Paperwhite screen is crisp but the battery drains faster than expected.
This Instant Pot saves me so much time in the kitchen, though the manual could be clearer.
The Fire TV Stick keeps buffering and the remote is unresponsive. Very disappointed.
Noise cancellation is top-notch and the comfort is unmatched. Worth every penny!
